item.title: ABOUT
item.description: Hey there ðŸ‘‹ðŸ§‘ I’m Steffen, a 20 year old CS Student at TUM Working part-time at Rubean My main skillset consists of: Java (Tutor in the courses PGDP & EIDI at TUM WS2020) C & Assembly (x86, SIMD) C# /.NET shell scripting deeper knowledge of GNU/Linux systems DirectX, OpenGL, bits of Vulkan GLSL, HLSL Unity Engine basics of Go & Python Btw, an old blog of mine can be found here.
